docs.snippet: U.S. Republican Donald Trump's presidential campaign appealed to Capitol Hill for support on Monday as his attacks on the Muslim parents of a decorated American soldier killed in Iraq drew sharp rebukes from fellow party members....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Republican Donald Trump's presidential campaign appealed to Capitol Hill for support on Monday as his attacks on the Muslim parents of a decorated American soldier killed in Iraq drew sharp rebukes from fellow party members.

headline.main: Trump Campaign Asks Capitol Hill to Back Him in Khan Controversy
headline.print_headline: Trump Campaign Asks Capitol Hill to Back Him in Khan Controversy

docs.snippet: For eight summer nights, there were two starkly different visions of America....

headline.main: Two Different Visions of America Emerge From Conventions
headline.print_headline: Two Different Visions of America Emerge From Conventions

docs.snippet: Angry and anxious, Republican lawmakers and veterans groups hastened to disavow Donald Trump's repeated criticism of a bereaved military family Monday, but the GOP presidential nominee refused to back down. He complained anew that he had been "vic...
docs.lead_paragraph: Angry and anxious, Republican lawmakers and veterans groups hastened to disavow Donald Trump's repeated criticism of a bereaved military family Monday, but the GOP presidential nominee refused to back down. He complained anew that he had been "viciously attacked" by the parents of a Muslim U.S. Army captain who was killed in Iraq.

headline.main: Criticism Grows for Trump's Assailing of Muslim Vet's Family
headline.print_headline: Criticism Grows for Trump's Assailing of Muslim Vet's Family

docs.snippet: Democracy doesn't come cheap. Between the logistics of accommodating an estimated 2,500 news reporters and arranging security for VIPs, the cost of hosting a presidential debate now tops $5 million....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democracy doesn't come cheap. Between the logistics of accommodating an estimated 2,500 news reporters and arranging security for VIPs, the cost of hosting a presidential debate now tops $5 million.

headline.main: Some Colleges Say Hosting a Debate Is Worth the $5M Cost
headline.print_headline: Some Colleges Say Hosting a Debate Is Worth the $5M Cost

docs.snippet: American credibility is on the line over the Trans-Pacific Partnership, Singapore's prime minister said Monday, urging its ratification despite growing political opposition in the U.S. to the 12-nation free trade pact....
docs.lead_paragraph: American credibility is on the line over the Trans-Pacific Partnership, Singapore's prime minister said Monday, urging its ratification despite growing political opposition in the U.S. to the 12-nation free trade pact.

headline.main: Singapore PM: US Credibility on the Line Over TPP Trade Deal
headline.print_headline: Singapore PM: US Credibility on the Line Over TPP Trade Deal

docs.snippet: Virginia Sen. Tim Kaine's name on the Democratic ticket can realistically nudge the pivotal state closer into Hillary Clinton's column — no small feat in a contest of two presidential nominees that engender strong feelings by themselves....
docs.lead_paragraph: Virginia Sen. Tim Kaine's name on the Democratic ticket can realistically nudge the pivotal state closer into Hillary Clinton's column — no small feat in a contest of two presidential nominees that engender strong feelings by themselves.

headline.main: Kaine May Give Democrats an Edge in Swing-State Virginia
